name: VR Sports - Golf
detailed_description:
Grip it and rip it with the new DLC, VR Sports - Golf! Get your daily dose of iron here and wash it down with a nice refreshing Arnold Palmer. With VR Sports - Golf, you
feel as if you're on the fairway yet don't have to worry about chasing the golf ball(s) into the woods. Sure, you're inside wearing a VR headset and not in Augusta, but until you get your green jacket, this will have to do.
*Bob Barker fight not included in this DLC*

short_description:
Grip it and rip it with the new DLC, VR Sports - Golf! Get your daily dose of iron here and wash it down with a nice refreshing Arnold Palmer. With VR Sports - Golf, you feel as if you're on the fairway yet don't have to worry about chasing the golf ball(s) into the woods. Sure, you're inside wearing a VR headset and not in Augusta, but until you get your green jacket, this will have to do.
*Bob Barker fight not included in this DLC*
supported_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1 or Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® i5-4590, AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970, AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or better, Video Output: HDMI 1.4, DisplayPort 1.2 or newer
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1x USB 2.0 or better port also required
